item.description: jar指定配置文件 1 2 3 4 5 java -jar myproject.jar --server.port = 8081 java -jar myproject.jar --server.config.location = /Users/michael/config/application.properties java -jar myproject.jar --server.config.location = /Users/michael/config/application.properties -Dserver.port = 8081
